title: Regen garen, that shit is broken
body:
Just played a game with garen and had warmogs + spirit visage...

gained 200-300 hp a second

replies.body: and then your ad carry auto attacks a minion twice and goes from 200 hp to over 1000.

DEMACIA!!
I guess it's a trade-off for not being the most effective in teamfights. 
I've never seen a Garen in LCS.

Well his engage + cc potential is lacking

The only useful thing he has about him is general tankiness and dunking carries
